# Student Verification with Unique ID

**Description:**
Implement a system for verifying students using a unique identifier (such as a student ID or government-issued number). This will ensure data integrity and prevent duplicate or fraudulent signups.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Add a unique ID field to student records.
- Require unique ID for all signups and data uploads.
- Validate uniqueness and format of the ID.

**Benefits:**
- Prevents duplicate student entries.
- Increases trust in the data and system.
- Enables secure integration with external data sources.
